languages.text: "А я вот едва не глохну здесь и без всяких колдовских голосов в голове. То ругань, то вопли торговцев, то стрельба — на Футфоле везде так!"

"This place is turning me nearly deaf as well, and that's without sorcerous voices in my head. If it's not swearing, it's merchants shouting, or gunshots — it's the same wherever one goes on Footfall!"
languages.original_text: "А я вот едва не глохну здесь и без всяких колдовских голосов в голове. То ругань, то вопли торговцев, то стрельба — на Футфоле везде так!"

traits.locale_text: "This place is turning me nearly deaf as well, and that's without sorcerous voices in my head. If it's not swearing, it's merchants shouting, or gunshots — it's the same wherever one goes on Footfall!"

"This place is turning me nearly deaf as well, and that's without sorcerous voices in my head. If it's not swearing, it's merchants shouting, or gunshots — it's the same wherever one goes on Footfall!"

"This place is turning me nearly deaf as well, and that's without sorcerous voices in my head. If it's not swearing, it's merchants shouting, or gunshots — it's the same wherever one goes on Footfall!"

"This place is turning me nearly deaf as well, and that's without sorcerous voices in my head. If it's not swearing, it's merchants shouting, or gunshots — it's the same wherever one goes on Footfall!"

languages.text: “这个地方也要把我的耳朵震聋了，还不包括我脑子里那些巫术的低语声。听到的不是咒骂，就是商人的叫喊声，要么就是枪声——无论走到落脚港哪个地方，都是这个样子！”
languages.original_text: "This place is turning me nearly deaf as well, and that's without sorcerous voices in my head. If it's not swearing, it's merchants shouting, or gunshots — it's the same wherever one goes on Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: “这个地方也要把我的耳朵震聋了，还不包括我脑子里那些巫术的低语声。听到的不是咒骂，就是商人的叫喊声，要么就是枪声——无论走到落脚港哪个地方，都是这个样子！”

languages.text: «Este lugar podría dejarme sordo a mí también, sin necesidad de voces siniestras en mi mente. Si no son las groserías, son los gritos de los mercaderes o los disparos... ¡y es así en todo Paso!».
languages.original_text: "This place is turning me nearly deaf as well, and that's without sorcerous voices in my head. If it's not swearing, it's merchants shouting, or gunshots — it's the same wherever one goes on Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: «Este lugar podría dejarme sordo a mí también, sin necesidad de voces siniestras en mi mente. Si no son las groserías, son los gritos de los mercaderes o los disparos... ¡y es así en todo Paso!».

languages.text: 「私もこの場所では耳が聞こえなくなりそうだよ。魔術的な声が、頭に入ってこぬ限りはな。間違いなく、あれは商人の叫び声や銃声だな…どこへいこうとも、フットフォールにはつきものだ」
languages.original_text: "This place is turning me nearly deaf as well, and that's without sorcerous voices in my head. If it's not swearing, it's merchants shouting, or gunshots — it's the same wherever one goes on Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: 「私もこの場所では耳が聞こえなくなりそうだよ。魔術的な声が、頭に入ってこぬ限りはな。間違いなく、あれは商人の叫び声や銃声だな…どこへいこうとも、フットフォールにはつきものだ」

languages.text: "Mich macht der Laden auch fast taub, allerdings ohne magische Stimmen in meinem Kopf. Egal, ob Flüche, brüllende Händler oder Schüsse ... es ist überall auf Footfall dasselbe."
languages.original_text: "This place is turning me nearly deaf as well, and that's without sorcerous voices in my head. If it's not swearing, it's merchants shouting, or gunshots — it's the same wherever one goes on Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: "Mich macht der Laden auch fast taub, allerdings ohne magische Stimmen in meinem Kopf. Egal, ob Flüche, brüllende Händler oder Schüsse ... es ist überall auf Footfall dasselbe."

languages.text: « Moi aussi, entre les jurons, les cris des marchands et les fusillades, je vais finir par devenir sourd. Mais ça n'a rien à voir avec des voix dans ma tête, c'est juste comme ça partout à Castel ! »
languages.original_text: "This place is turning me nearly deaf as well, and that's without sorcerous voices in my head. If it's not swearing, it's merchants shouting, or gunshots — it's the same wherever one goes on Footfall!"

traits.locale_text: « Moi aussi, entre les jurons, les cris des marchands et les fusillades, je vais finir par devenir sourd. Mais ça n'a rien à voir avec des voix dans ma tête, c'est juste comme ça partout à Castel ! »

languages.text: "Burası beni de neredeyse sağır edecek, ki kafamda büyülü sesler olmamasına rağmen söylüyorum bunu. Küfürler, bağıran tüccarlar, silah sesleri... Binliman'da nereye gidersen git hep aynı!"
languages.original_text: "This place is turning me nearly deaf as well, and that's without sorcerous voices in my head. If it's not swearing, it's merchants shouting, or gunshots — it's the same wherever one goes on Footfall!"
